label: AB4C2_oP28_62_c_4c_2c-001
title: Berthierite (FeSb$_{2}$S$_{4}$, $E3_{3}$) Structure
comments:
We have updated our reference from the obscure (Buerger, 1953) to the more accessible (Periotto, 2012). 
 The ICSD entry for this structure lists CaFe$_{2}$O$_{4}$ as the prototype, but we will use FeSb$_{2}$S$_{4}$, as it was given the $E3_{3}$ {\em Sturkturbericht} label. 
 The data for this structure was given in the $Pnam$ orientation of space group \#62.  We used FINDSYM to place it in the standard $Pnma$ orientation.
